title: I think im gonna quit after this one
body:
Hi guys I've been recently having an issue while joining games in LOL, after champ select I get into loading screen yay everythings going great but when i get into loading screen I see a black screen and nothing about 5 seconds later I get a message saying "Unable to Connect to Server Please Check Your connection and try again later", after I try everything possible and it dosen't work. SO NOW IM STUCK IN A PERMA QUEUE 20 MINUTES IF YOU HAVE ANY IDEAS THAT CAN HELP message back


-Biostir MID(Man In Distress)

I seem to be having the same issue, sometimes you may get lucky and are able to connect.  Sadly most the time I am booted out and given a dodge penalty.

This sounds like it's been a stressful situation, and sorry you've been going through it.  It sounds like your network is having problems reaching our game servers, further affirmed by the black screen which can't download any assets.  You'll want to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen up your network.

The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty will have to be removed by playing games without further leaves.  The system treats everyone equally, even if you didn't mean to leave, because all leave causes other a negative experiences.

I hope that helps!
